title: [Rant]rr campus boys hostel mattress
content:
do not buy the mattresses sold in the fucking hostel

they suck ass and are expensive than regular ones  
u'll find better ones somewhere

comments.body: Lol is it?what type of bed they sell? Like normal or cuboid like?
They are non foldable and are of ass quality
I remember some shops being there within 2-3km range not sure tho
